TopicTitle: I have a problem with my plane...

Articles.Content:
So I've been working on my space shuttle in the SPH, and I noticed that when I select one of the landing legs that I use to (try to) open the payload bay doors, it selects the whole ship except for the cockpit. I've seen it happen on a live stream once and it was apparently the case of corruption. I also noticed that it is only on that certain part that makes it happen. I tried re-loading the craft but it is still the same so most likely I saved it like that. So i'm trying to fix the ship, should i try and edit the .craft and remove that part out? (I can provide pictures if necessary)Any help is greatly appreciated.

Edit: Well I sorta found a solution, The leg was placed in symmetry so i tried picking up the one on the opposite side and i could remove it, but if i try to put it back in the same sport I run into the same problem again. Sorry about this, I should have done more testing with it before i brought it here...

Edited August 15, 2013 by xzxvrx
Problem Partially Solved
